items.content_html: QR_Code Generator built with React allows users to easily create custom QR codes. Simply input text or a URL, and the app generates a scannable QR code in real-time. It’s lightweight, responsive, and user-friendly, providing a seamless experience across devices for quick and efficient QR code generation.
items.title: ak-dev-mern/QR_Code-Generator---React: QR_Code Generator built with React allows users to easily create custom QR codes. Simply input text or a URL, and the app generates a scannable QR code in real-time. It’s lightweight, responsive, and user-friendly, providing a seamless experience across devices for quick and efficient QR code generation.
